page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT,SAUNDERSFOOT.
page.content: Saundersfoot Festivities Association organise a number of annual events. They include a Fireworks Display on Nov.5th,Carnival,Water sports and Donkey Derbys.The events raise money for various charities and local organisations.In addition to this St.Issell's Church runs a Fete during July for church funds.An extra event is"Saundersfoot in Bloom"week,when shops and house owner asked to put on a display of flowers around their premises.Saundersfoot also takes part in"Wales in Bloom". Saundersfoot Musical Youth performed Oklahoma at Easter. Various concerts are held in places of worship throughout the year.The most recent annual event, started in June 1984,is Edwardian Week when villagers dress in Edwardian clothes and each day small groups run craft stalls on the harbour.
